questionHistory.aiResponse:
Hi! I'm here to help you create your perfect AI fitness coach. This will take about 15-20 minutes, and I'll adapt the questions based on your experience level.

Before we dive in, do you have a gender preference for your coach? Some people connect better with a male or female coaching style. You can say 'male', 'female', or 'no preference' - totally up to you!

So you're open to whatever, which is awesome. But help me dial this in - when you picture yourself crushing a workout with T-Swift in your ears, what does that look like? What's the vibe you're after?

And those rare moments when you DO have time â€“ are we talking 15 minutes at home, or could you carve out 30-45 if it actually helped you handle stress better?
